cloudbase.core.client
Interface BatchScanner

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<Key,Value>>, ScannerBase
All Known Implementing Classes:
TabletServerBatchReader
public interface BatchScanner
extends ScannerBase, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<Key,Value>>

Implementations of BatchScanner support efficient lookups of many ranges in cloudbase.

iterator

java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<Key,Value>> iterator()
Returns an iterator over a cloudbase table. This iterator uses the options that are currently set for its lifetime. So setting options will have no effect on existing iterators.

Specified by:
